subject: Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hello,
Can you tell me if the it is possible to adapt the Simsonn Vam Pro  on the
logitech RS Pedals ?
Meilleures salutations.
Colas Patrice.

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrice COLAS,    Thank you for your question â€” yes, in theory, Simsonn's VAM Pro Haptic system can be used with any pedal set, including Logitech RS Pedals. The only requirement is using Simsonn's control box (Plus X Control Box) to connect and drive the haptic functionality.  However, we currently do not offer official mounting brackets for non-Simsonn pedals (such as Logitech RS).
